(but there Maximals too. Why shouldn't they be alowed in? Plintissa's team
is with the Maximals.
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 9:10 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Uhhh...Ilovealllizrads, you're kind of moding.  One minute you're
fighting
> outside with Pegasus and Striker, the next you mysteriously get through
> sealed doors to Plintissa.  You're also not really responding to Pegasus
> (Jfrey) as I've noticed.  I think you should try clarifying these things,
> because what you're doing isn't really making much sense)
>
>
> Ramhorn:
>
> "Slag!" Ramhorn yelled, slamming a foot to the ground.  "Insubordinate
fool."
> ~Ramulus, this is Ramhorn.  I need you go to (gives the coordinates and
> section where Plintissa) and take Plintissa, she's a kind of squid robot,
and
> take her to the brig and guard her.  If she attacks at all, shoot to kill.
> We can't afford to lose anymore good Maximals.  You'll have internal base
> defenses to help you.  THere are two others, you may have to shoot to kill
> anyways."
>
> Watching Kamodia try to get in, he presses a few buttons, another missile
> launcher extending from the side of the Ark, firing two seeking missiles
at
> Wraith.
> ~Striker, Pegasus, it's Ramhorn.  Try and take these people out fast, kill
> them if you have to.  We've got intruders inside the Ark and we need them
> stopped~
>
> Seeing Bluestreak and Ratchet on a video monitor, Ramhorn smiled.
Activating
> a comlink to them, he spoke:
>
> ~Hey, if you're Maximals we need your help,~ Ramhorn spoked, unlocking the
> door Bluestreak and Ratchet were near, ~We've got intruders, and if you
join
> us we need your help badly.  If you go after them (he gives them their
> positions, their being Plintissa, Wraith, and Kamodia), you have
> authorization to shoot to kill~
>
> Ramhorn took out his submachine gun, loading it up.
>
